title: I just witnessed an enemy Vladmir rip his toxic Vayne to shreds
body:
*post game lobby after Vlad's team lost*

Vladmir: Vayne, you're a c*nt.

Your Mom's a c*nt

Your Dad's a c*nt

Me: omg





Vladmir: Your grandad's a c*nt

Your grandmom's a c*nt

Your sister's a c*nt

Your cousin's a c*nt

Me: ohohohoohohoo!

(but he kept going)




Vladmir: Your freaking DOG is a c*nt

Your brother is a c*nt

Your boss is a c*nt

Your whole family is a C*nt

HAVE A NICE DAY


Me: (chuckling)



*toxic Vayne suddenly quiet sat through the whole thing and left without a word after being shrekt*



I love bronze solo qq

Bronze's finest
